id: we.must act knowing that.our work will be imperfect
we.must act knowing that.today’s victories will be only partial
we.will.seize it – so long as we seize it together
we.will.respond to the threat of climate change
we.will.maintain our economic vitality and our national treasure
we.will.defend our people and uphold our values through strength of arms and rule of law
we.have.have never relinquished our skepticism of central authority
we.have.always understood that when times change
we.have.lost know too well the price that is paid for liberty
we.all.define liberty in exactly the same way
we.all.make to the flag that waves above and that fills our hearts with pride
